changelog:
- ✨ New, cleaner search design – modern UI that makes finding books faster and smoother
  
- ⌨️ Smart keyboard behavior – type, search, done → keyboard hides automatically
  
- 🧹 Cache clearing control – now YOU decide when to clear old results & refresh searches
  
- 🎨 Refined design improvements– books look sharper, covers cleaner, library feel upgraded
 
- ⚡ Performance tweaks – faster responses, less clutter, more flow
 

 💡 PDFBuks 1.0.6 gave you style. PDFBuks 1.0.7 gives you control.
